scripts.test: node ./tests/unit.js --quiet && node ./src/server/server.js --quiet & node ./tests/function.js && pkill -SIGINT node || pkill -SIGINT node
scripts.start-dev: npm run build-js-watch & npm run debug
scripts.deploy-staging: npm run build-js && gcloud beta app deploy --no-promote --no-stop-previous-version --project=secrethitlerdottv --version=$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | sed 's/\./\-/g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]')
scripts.deploy-production: npm run build-js && gcloud beta app deploy --project=secrethitlerdottv --version=$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | sed 's/\./\-/g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]')
